attributes.action: Ensure all people sent to prison should personally incur the full cost of their stay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition to ensure all people sent to prison personally incur the full cost of their stay, including all expenses such as food and all other requirements.

For far too long the general public have had to pay huge taxes which contribute to such dispicable causes.  Why should we, the law abiding public pay for people who do not abide by the law?

If people struggle to afford such costs or are actually in debt by such fees its tough luck!  This could provide a good and hard lesson to avoid breaking the law in future.
